title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 6 categories on the x axis representing Country, and Share in total export in each Country on the y axis.
Germany is higher than any other categories with value 12.9, followed by United States, and United Kingdom. Down to category Italy with the lowest value of 4.1.
The highest value at Germany is almost 3.15 times larger than the minimum value of Italy.
